flow-definition.description: release build for SapMachine 19 on linux_aarch64.<!-- Managed by Jenkins Job Builder -->

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_REF
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Git tag, branch or commit to build.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SAPMACHINE_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Either a SapMachine Release Tag or a JDK Major version. If empty, GIT_REF is used.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Sets the version build number explicitly.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SAPMACHINE_ARCHIVE_NAME_PREFIX
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The prefix of the bundle archive.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVKIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Devkit, could be either a path that locally exists or the GAV coordinates to a tar.gz archive to be downloaded and extracted.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTRA_CONFIGURE_OPTIONS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Extra configure options passed directly to configure script.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hotspot_test_groups
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Select the test group for jtreg hotspot tests. Empty means disabled.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: jdk_test_groups
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Select the test group for jtreg jdk tests. Empty means disabled.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: langtools_test_groups
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Select the test group for jtreg langtools tests. Empty means disabled.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: PUBLISH
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: When set to true, the resulting bundles will be published to GitHub.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: When set to true, marks this build as a release build, otherwise as pre-release.
